alert.note: Alert for Boone; Lincoln; Logan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 7:42AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln, north central Logan and Boone Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 742 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Van, or near Madison, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Chapmanville, Van, Wharton, Julian, Harts, Danville, Whitesville, Sylvester, Turtle Creek, Prenter, Woodville, Foster, Blair, Sharples, Alkol, Mud and Jeffrey. This includes Route 119 between mile markers 36 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
